title: Force Lance (unrand)
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A plain iron lance, imbued with supernatural gravitas via the artifice of the mage Gell. It strikes with a force many times stronger than that imparted by the wielder.}} [[File:Force lance (unrand).png]] '''''the Force Lance''''' +5 lance (modified [[spear]]: 8 base damage) [[Heavy]] brand
Has a 1/3 chance of knocking back foes 1 tile when landing a damaging blow ==Desirability== The '''Force Lance'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|1746}} is a relatively strong 1-handed polearm. While a branded [[demon trident]] will deal more damage per turn, this artefact can knock enemies back, and can be found much earlier than a demon trident. Knocking enemies into a wall, impassible terrain (like [[deep water]] or [[lava]]), or another enemy will cause some extra damage. This artefact is more likely to spawn in the early game, where it is more likely to be useful. ==History== *The Force Lance unrand was added in [[0.30]], named after the spell of the [[Force Lance (spell)|same name]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Polearms]]
